trigger_prototype.name: {#DEVICENAME} Status
trigger_prototype.description: If Hardware Value does not return OK

item_prototype.name: {#SPNAME} - Cache - High Watermark Flushes
item_prototype.description: Total IOs processed by the SP

item_prototype.name: {#SPNAME} - Cache - Low Watermark Flushes
item_prototype.description: Total IOs processed by the SP

item_prototype.description: Total IOs processed by the SP

item_prototype.description: Total IOs processed by the SP

item_prototype.name: {#VOLDEVICEID} - {#VOLALIAS} - Read Response Time
item_prototype.description:
Calculates average response time (Time spent/IOs)
Note: EMC Sample times are given in Microseconds

item_prototype.name: {#VOLDEVICEID} - {#VOLALIAS} - Write Response Time
item_prototype.description:
Calculates average response time (Time spent/IOs)
Note: EMC Sample times are given in Microseconds
